Gisele Passaia

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6517114026860153
  • Última atualização do currículo em 22/02/2018

I am graduated in Biological Sciences (Bachelor) at University of Vale do Rio dos Sinos (2006). Master's degree in Molecular Cell Biology at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (2009). Ph.D in Genetics and Molecular Biology at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul - UFRGS. I am experienced in genetics, with emphasis on plant molecular biology, acting on the following topics: differential gene expression analysis (cDNA-AFLP, qRT-PCR); Oryza sativa, Nicotiana tabacum and Arabidopsis thaliana genetic transformation; subcellular localization of gene products in protoplasts; Yeast two-hybrid screening analysis. (Texto informado pelo autor)
